name: Automata
description:
Capture enemy commander-type androids, reprogram them to make them allies, and use the mana system to improve their performance and annihilate the enemies.

An army of androids is approaching.
An android army suddenly attacked your planet. Your mission is to destroy this android.
Go to the battlefield and capture the enemy commander-type android. Fight off all enemies while reprogramming at your base and using it as a friendly force.

3D physics
Implement naughty bouncing breasts, shaking clothes, and shaking hair. Also, the grass growing on the ground in the map sways in the wind.
* Performance is prioritized for hair swaying. Only when you are close enough to the character will you see the shaking.

reprogramming
Captured enemy commander-type androids are sent to the reprogramming room.
By making full use of various commands and raising the degree of obedience to 100, you can convert the android into an allied force.
Reprogramming progresses gradually by giving the android an unknown stimulus other than combat.
Command list: vibe, anal vibe, double vibe, pleasure beam, nipple rotor, clitoris rotor.
Each command has three levels.
As android development progresses, new commands become available.

mana system
The research team developed a mana system because the strength was insufficient to annihilate the enemy forces.
You can do many things with mana.
Improving the basic abilities of the android and yourself.
Convert to android allied forces.
Generation of new weapons and armor.
Warp to an unreachable enemy force area (battle map release)

To get mana, sexually orgasm the reprogramming androids.

combat type
All combatants have a fixed combat type.
Assault
scouter
sniper
There are three types of Weapons that can be equipped are different.
Assault can be equipped with shotgun type weapons.
Scouters can equip pistol-type weapons.
Snipers can equip rifle-type weapons.
*You can choose your battle type at the beginning of the game. It cannot be changed in-game.

fight
Enemy factions may send reinforcements during battle.
Improve performance enough with the mana system and win.
It is also possible to sortie again to the map where the commander was once captured. At that time, even if you capture the commander, the same android will not increase.

commander type android
Currently, 10 commander-type androids have been confirmed.
Capture all units.
